name: Bank Harvest
description:
The village is cursed, all remains you, dad and an elder who sells staff which can remove the curse. But it’s expensive, you have to plant needed plants so you can get fiber to counterfeit money and paint it. White plant is needed for fiber, others for color. After you get enough plant go your father (in factory) he will give you money and with that buy staff then go for skull.!

1- All voices is me

2-All models created by me

3-CANNOT PASS RIVER WITHOUT STAFF

Please review and comment so I can make my next games better.
